data.name: Ant-Man
data.description: A master thief skilled at disabling powerful opponents with the help of his Pym Particle powered suit.

starItems.name: Ant-Man
starItems.description: A master thief skilled at disabling powerful opponents with the help of his Pym Particle powered suit.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + copy a positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to clear the copied effect.

If Wasp is an ally, she also gains the copied effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + copy a positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self + <color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to clear the copied effect.

If Wasp is an ally, she also gains the copied effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Always clear a positive effect from the primary target

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + copy and clear a positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self.

If Wasp is an ally, she also gains the copied effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + copy and clear a positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self.

If Wasp is an ally, she also gains the copied effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + copy and clear a positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self.

If Wasp is an ally, she also gains the copied effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + copy and clear a positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self.

If Wasp is an ally, she also gains the copied effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage + copy and clear a positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from the target to self.

If Wasp is an ally, she also gains the copied effect.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> characters.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an assist from an ally Wasp

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an assist from an ally Wasp.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an assist from an ally Wasp

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an assist from an ally Wasp.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Always gain an assist from an ally Wasp

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain an assist from an ally Wasp.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from the primary target
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, this attack will also have the additional effects of this character's Ultimate - Stomp, targeting the primary target

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain an assist from an ally Wasp.

On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally:
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from the primary target.
 > This attack will also have the additional effects of this character's Ultimate - Stomp, targeting the primary target.

This attack cannot be dodged or blocked.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random additional enemies.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
Chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to +<color=#86e619>1</color> additional random enemy

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random additional enemies.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to all enemies
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color>

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

<color=#86e619>75%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to <color=#86e619>3</color> random additional enemies.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Always apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all additional enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all additional enemies.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all additional enemies.

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all additional enemies.
6.nextUpgrade:
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from the primary target
If Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, this attack will also have the additional effects of this character's Special - Gum Up the Works, targeting the primary target

7.description:
On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, clear <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> from the primary target.

Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to primary target.

Apply <color=#fff568>Slow</color> to all additional enemies.

If Spider-Man (Big Time) is an ally, this attack will also have the additional effects of this character's Special - Gum Up the Works, targeting the primary target.

1.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to Wasp if she is an ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
On <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> or <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: On <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>

2.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to Wasp if she is an ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
On non-<color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or non-<color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color>, <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
On <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> or <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally turn
Always gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> or <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally turn

3.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to Wasp if she is an ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
On non-<color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or non-<color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color>, <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
On <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> or <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

4.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to Wasp if she is an ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
On non-<color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or non-<color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color>, <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
On <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> or <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> on <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally turn
In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to Wasp if she is an ally.

On Turn, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
On non-<color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> or non-<color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color>, <color=#fff568>HERO</color> ally turn, <color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.
On <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> or <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> ally turn, gain <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color>.

In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, on Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>INFESTATION</color> and <color=#fff568>PYM TECH</color> allies.
